price: Идите ти и брат твој, с доказима Мојим, и нека сам вам Ја увек на памети.
arabic: ٱذۡهَبۡ أَنتَ وَأَخُوكَ بِـَٔايَٰتِي وَلَا تَنِيَا فِي ذِكۡرِي

version.title: Serbian Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Serbian by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: idh'hab anta wa-akhūka biāyātī walā taniyā fī dhik'rī
